subject: Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
Doping (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Alberto Contador, the three-time winner of the Tour de France, is insisting the minute traces of clenbuterol in his system came from meat he ate during the Tour last July.
snippet: Alberto Contador, the three-time winner of the Tour de France, is insisting the minute traces of clenbuterol in his system came from meat he ate during the Tour last July.
